directions.step:
1. Peel, core, and thinly slice apples. Put them in a saucepan with 1/4 cup of the water and 1/4 cup of the applejuice. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 1 hour. Mix cornstarch with the 2 Tb of applejuice. Stir into the mix, and stir until it thickens.
2. Put all ingredients in a blender and puree until smooth. Refriger- ate. Makes about 4 cups.
